text: Maria Shriver net worth : Maria Shriver is an American journalist, author and former First Lady of California who has a net worth of $ 100 million dollars. An Emmy and Peabody - winning journalist and the author of six books, Maria Shriver is also the niece of John F. Kennedy and Robert Kennedy, and the wife of actor / politician Arnold Schwarzenegger. Most recently, she presented ` ` The Shriver Report'', which through comprehensive study, detailed the changing role of women in the workforce and its impact on American society. Born November 6, 1955 in Chicago, Illinois, Shiver is perhaps best known to be the niece of the late John F. & Robert F. Kennedy. She is a former NBC news correspondent and former wife of actor ( and former Governor of California ) Arnold Schwarzenegger
